typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		Size as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRCSME
source(output(
		AREA_OF_CHANGE_SR_KEY as integer,
		AREA_OF_CHANGE_CODE as string,
		AREA_OF_CHANGE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMAREAOFCHANGE
source(output(
		DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATE_TIME as timestamp,
		DAY_OF_MONTH as integer,
		CALENDER_MONTH_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_MONTH_ID as integer,
		CALENDER_YEAR as integer,
		CALENDER_QUARTER_ID as string,
		CALENDER_QUARTER_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_HALF_YEAR_ID as string,
		CALENDER_HALF_YEAR_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_MONTH_ID as string,
		FISCAL_MONTH_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_QUARTER_ID as string,
		FISCAL_QUARTER_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_HALF_YEAR_ID as string,
		FISCAL_HALF_YEAR_NAME as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMDATE
source(output(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC as string,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE
source(output(
		COURSE_SR_KEY as integer,
		COURSE_NAME as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCOURSE
source(output(
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_ES as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_FR as string,
		ISO2_CODE as string,
		ISO3_CODE as string,
		LEAST_DEVELPED_COUNTRY as string,
		LAND_LCKD_DEVELOPING_COUNTRY as string,
		SMALL_ISLAND_DEVELOPING_STATES as string,
		DEVELOPED_DEVELOPING_COUNTRY as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCOUNTRY
source(output(
		ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_CODE as string,
		ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_DESC as string,
		LOWER_SZIE_LIMIT as integer,
		HIGHER_SIZE_LIMIT as integer,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMENTITYSIZEGROUP
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMENTITY
source(output(
		ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ENTITY_TYPE_DESC as string,
		ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMENTITYSUBTYPE
source(output(
		ENTITY_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ENTITY_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMENTITYTYPE
source(output(
		GENDER_SR_KEY as integer,
		GENDER_CODE as string,
		GENDER_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMGENDER
source(output(
		PLATFORM_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		PLATFORM_TYPE_CODE as string,
		PLATFORM_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPLATFORMTYPE
source(output(
		PROFESSIONAL_STATUS_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROFESSIONAL_STATUS_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPROFESSIONALSTATUS
source(output(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PROJECT_TITLE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPROJECT
source(output(
		SERVICE_THEME_SR_KEY as integer,
		SERVICE_THERE_CODE as string,
		SERVICE_THEME_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMSERVICETHEME
source(output(
		DATA_SOURCE_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATA_SOURCE_NAME as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMSOURCE
source(output(
		AGE_GROUP_SR_KEY as integer,
		AGE_GROUP_CODE as string,
		AGE_GROUP_DESC as string,
		LOWER_AGE_LIMIT as integer,
		HIGHER_AGE_LIMIT as integer,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMAGEGROUP
source(output(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		EMAIL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH as integer,
		NATIONALITY as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		ID as string,
		USERNAME as string,
		HOWLONG as string,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE as string,
		SALUTATION as string,
		CITY_NAME as string,
		POBOX as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		SKYPE as string,
		AIM as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		MSN as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPARTICIPANT
DIMAREAOFCHANGE select(mapColumn(
		AREA_OF_CHANGE_SR_KEY,
		AREA_OF_CHANGE_CODE,
		AREA_OF_CHANGE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAREAOFCHANGE
SRCSME, SelectAREAOFCHANGE lookup(upper(trim({Area of change})) == upper(trim(AREA_OF_CHANGE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookUpAreaofChange
DIMDATE select(mapColumn(
		CERTIFICATION_DATE_SR_KEY = DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCertificationDate
LookUpAreaofChange, SelectCertificationDate lookup(toDate(Certification_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') == toDate(toString(DATE_TIME),'MM/DD/YYYY'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookUpDimDate
DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE select(mapColumn(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_CODE,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectContextSubType
LookUpDimDate, SelectContextSubType lookup(upper(trim(Context)) == upper(trim(CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupContextSubType
DIMCOURSE select(mapColumn(
		COURSE_SR_KEY,
		COURSE_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCourse
LookupContextSubType, SelectCourse lookup(upper(trim(SRCSME@Course_name)) == upper(trim(SelectCourse@COURSE_NAME)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCourseName
DIMDATE select(mapColumn(
		DATE_COLLECTION_DATE_SR_KEY = DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDateofDataCollection
DIMDATE select(mapColumn(
		DATE_OF_BIRTH_SR_KEY = DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDateOfBirth
DIMDATE select(mapColumn(
		ENROLL_DATE_SR_KEY = DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEnrollDate
LookupCourseName, SelectEnrollDate lookup(toDate(Enrol_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') == 
toDate(toString(SelectEnrollDate@DATE_TIME),'MM/DD/YYYY'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEnrollDate
DIMCOUNTRY select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_COUNTRY_SR_KEY = COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN,
		COUNTRY_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEntityCountry
LookupEnrollDate, SelectEntityCountry lookup(upper(trim(Country)) == upper(trim(COUNTRY_NAME_EN)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEntityCountry
DIMENTITYSIZEGROUP select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_CODE,
		ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEntitySize
LookupEntityCountry, SelectEntitySize lookup(upper(trim(Size)) == upper(trim(ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEntitySize
DIMENTITY select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_ID,
		ENTITY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimEntity
LookupEntitySize, SelectDimEntity lookup(upper(trim({Organization/ Company name})) == upper(trim(ENTITY_NAME)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEntityname
DIMENTITYSUBTYPE select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_DESC,
		ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEntitySubType
LookupEntityname, SelectEntitySubType lookup(upper(trim({Sub-type of entity})) == upper(trim(ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_DESC))
	&& upper(trim({Type of entity})) == upper(trim(ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEntitySubType
DIMENTITYTYPE select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_TYPE_CODE,
		ENTITY_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEntityType
LookupEntitySubType, SelectEntityType lookup(upper(trim({Type of entity})) == upper(trim(ENTITY_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupEntityType
DIMGENDER select(mapColumn(
		GENDER_SR_KEY,
		GENDER_CODE,
		GENDER_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGender
LookupEntityType, SelectGender lookup(upper(trim(Gender)) == upper(trim(GENDER_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupGender
DIMCOUNTRY select(mapColumn(
		PARTICIPANT_HOME_COUNTRY_SR_KEY = COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_CODE,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectHomeCountry
LookupGender, SelectHomeCountry lookup(upper(trim(Country)) == upper(trim(SelectHomeCountry@COUNTRY_NAME_EN)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupHomeCountry
DIMPLATFORMTYPE select(mapColumn(
		PLATFORM_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		PLATFORM_TYPE_CODE,
		PLATFORM_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPlatformType
LookupHomeCountry, SelectPlatformType lookup(upper(trim({Type of tool})) == upper(trim(PLATFORM_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupPlatformType
DIMPROFESSIONALSTATUS select(mapColumn(
		PROFESSIONAL_STATUS_SR_KEY,
		PROFESSIONAL_STATUS_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProfessionalStatus
LookupPlatformType, SelectProfessionalStatus lookup(upper(trim({Professional status})) == upper(trim(PROFESSIONAL_STATUS_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProfessionalStatus
DIMPROJECT select(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProject
LookupProfessionalStatus, SelectProject lookup(upper(trim(ProjectID)) == upper(trim(PROJECT_ID)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProjectID
DIMSERVICETHEME select(mapColumn(
		SERVICE_THEME1_SR_KEY = SERVICE_THEME_SR_KEY,
		SERVICE_THERE_CODE,
		SERVICE_THEME_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectServiceTheme
LookupProjectID, SelectServiceTheme lookup(upper(trim({Service themes})) == upper(trim(SERVICE_THEME_DESC))
	&& upper(trim({Service theme})) == upper(trim(SERVICE_THEME_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupServiceTheme
LookupServiceTheme, SelectDateofDataCollection lookup(toDate({Date of data collection},'MM/DD/YYYY') == 
toDate(toString(SelectDateofDataCollection@DATE_TIME),'MM/DD/YYYY'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDateCollection
LookupAGELIMIT, SelectDateOfBirth lookup(toDate('01/01/'+toString({Year of birth}),'DD/MM/YYYY') == 
toDate(toString(SelectDateOfBirth@DATE_TIME),'DD/MM/YYYY'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDateOfBirth
DIMSOURCE select(mapColumn(
		SOURCE_SR_KEY = DATA_SOURCE_SR_KEY,
		DATA_SOURCE_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSourceFileName
LookupDateOfBirth, SelectSourceFileName lookup(upper(trim(FILE_NAME)) == upper(trim(DATA_SOURCE_NAME)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSourceFileName
DIMAGEGROUP select(mapColumn(
		AGE_GROUP_SR_KEY,
		AGE_GROUP_CODE,
		LOWER_AGE_LIMIT,
		HIGHER_AGE_LIMIT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAGELIMIT
LookupDateCollection, SelectAGELIMIT lookup(minus(year(toDate({Date of data collection}, 'MM/DD/YYYY')),year(toDate({Year of birth},'MM/DD/YYYY'))) >= LOWER_AGE_LIMIT
	&& minus(year(toDate({Date of data collection}, 'MM/DD/YYYY')),year(toDate({Year of birth},'MM/DD/YYYY'))) <= HIGHER_AGE_LIMIT,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'left')~> LookupAGELIMIT
DIMPARTICIPANT select(mapColumn(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY,
		PARTICIPANT_ID,
		EMAIL,
		LAST_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		GENDER,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueParticipant
LookupSourceFileName, SelectUniqueParticipant lookup(coalesce(SRCSME@Email,concat({First name},{Last name},SRCSME@Gender,toString({Year of birth}))) == coalesce(SelectUniqueParticipant@EMAIL,concat(FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,SelectUniqueParticipant@GENDER,toString(YEAR_OF_BIRTH))),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupUniqueParticipant
LookupUniqueParticipant derive(CERTIFIED_FLAG = case(
    Certified == "Yes",'Y',
    Certified == 'No','N'
),
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> runinfo
runinfo sink(input(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		EVENT_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		TRAINING_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		PLATFORM_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATE_COLLECTION_DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		SUBMISSON_DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		GENDER_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATE_OF_BIRTH_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATE_OF_BIRTH2_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_HOME_COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROFESSIONAL_STATUS_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		SOURCE_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_SR_KEY as integer,
		COURSE_SR_KEY as integer,
		AREA_OF_CHANGE_SR_KEY as integer,
		SERVICE_THEME1_SR_KEY as integer,
		SERVICE_THEME2_SR_KEY as integer,
		HS_CODE_SR_KEY as integer,
		INT_STD_INDUSTRY_CODES_ISIC_SR_KEY as integer,
		TOP_MANAGER_GENDER_SR_KEY as integer,
		TOP_MANAGER_AGE_GROUP_KEY as integer,
		AGE_GROUP_SR_KEY as integer,
		CERTIFICATION_DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		CERTIFIED_FLAG as integer,
		ENROLL_DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		YOUTH_MANAGED_FLAG as integer,
		WOMAN_MANAGED_FLAG as integer,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		PLATFORM_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY,
		DATE_COLLECTION_DATE_SR_KEY,
		GENDER_SR_KEY,
		DATE_OF_BIRTH_SR_KEY,
		PARTICIPANT_HOME_COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		PROFESSIONAL_STATUS_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		SOURCE_SR_KEY,
		ENTITY_SIZE_GROUP_SR_KEY,
		COURSE_SR_KEY,
		AREA_OF_CHANGE_SR_KEY,
		SERVICE_THEME1_SR_KEY,
		AGE_GROUP_SR_KEY,
		CERTIFICATION_DATE_SR_KEY,
		CERTIFIED_FLAG,
		ENROLL_DATE_SR_KEY,
		BATCH_ID,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FACTPROJECTEVENTSINDIVIDUAL

parameters{
	filename as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		Size as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Priorexperience = replace(Priorexperience,'N/A',''),
		Certification_date = iif(isNull(toDate(Certification_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')),'',Certification_date),
		filename = 'SME/'+replace($filename, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		Size as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'filename') ~> sink1
